message: Greetings! I have a fantastic product available for $10000. It's a unique opportunity, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. While I can't divulge specifics, I can assure you I stand behind its quality.  This is my first sale, so you'll be the first to experience what I have to offer. What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, since there's no historical data to assess the quality of your products, I'm going to pass on this one. Perhaps if you have a few more sales under your belt, I'll revisit the opportunity.

Okay, I'm willing to take a chance on your product. Let's see if it lives up to your claim of being top-notch.
